comments.body: this is surprising to me... was this missing from the v1 CRI API?
should this avoid mixing fixes or other additions into this PR, and keep this focused on the hostProcess addition?

These updates were discussed in the hostProcess KEP but I can split them out into a separate commit or PR if that would be easier to track.

https://github.com/kubernetes/enhancements/tree/master/keps/sig-windows/1981-windows-privileged-container-support#cri-implementation-details
nit: is this a json "as is"? Sometimes there is a confusion when json used whether wrapping braces are included or not.

This was copied over from the ContainerSecurityContext: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/bc637a7a07cf917140daa3bd434eac9bbd8fe92c/staging/src/k8s.io/cri-api/pkg/apis/runtime/v1alpha2/api.proto#L697-L704 

The json used here is passed directly through to the runtime as is and I believe it includes the brakets.  The way this is used in practice is via the gmsa webhook: https://github.com/kubernetes-sigs/windows-gmsa/ which converts a CRD to the json.
